Recognition and Awards:HCLTech was recognized as a "RISE with SAP Validated Partner" on May 1, 2025, demonstrating expertise in SAP software and complex cloud transformation projects.

RSA Conference Presentation:HCLTech was scheduled to present at the RSA Conference 2025 on May 1, 2025, with a presentation titled "Powering Secure Network Transformation with Zscaler and HCLTech" at Booth #5361 - Moscone North Expo.

Dividend Information:While the record date for an interim dividend of ₹18 per share was April 28, 2025, investors holding shares as of that date were eligible for the dividend, which was expected to be paid on May 6, 2025.

HCLTech was also awarded Intel's 2025 EPIC Supplier Award on April 29, 2025, for their successful go-to-market efforts.

HCLTech's financial results for Q4 FY25 were released earlier in April.

Estimates and commentary from brokerage firms were also available regarding HCLTech's Q1 FY26 performance.

The company's stock was trading at ₹1,570.95 with a 0.13% gain on May 5, 2025.

There is mention of HCLTech's plans for a techfin hub in GIFT City.

HCLTech announced a partnership with UK residential developer Taylor Wimpey for digital transformation.
